Package CAMs

Class User

java.lang.Object
CAMs.User
public abstract class User extends Object
The class serves as a base class for representing users in a system.It defines common attributes and behavior that are shared by various types of users.
Since:
2023-11-25
Version:
3.0
Author:
Jeevika, Mathangi, Teja, Vikaas

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User(String name, String email, CAMs.Schools faculty)
      Constructs new User with specified name, email, and faculty.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the user.
      email - The email address of the user.
      faculty - The faculty to which the user belongs, represented by an instance of the `Schools` class.

  • Method Details

    • printMenu

      public abstract void printMenu()
      Abstract method to be implemented by subclasses to print the user menu.

    • getUserType

      public abstract CAMs.UserType getUserType()
      Abstract method to be implemented by subclasses to get the user type.
      Returns:
      The user type.

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Retrieves the name of the user in uppercase.
      Returns:
      The uppercase name of the user.

    • getEmail

      public String getEmail()
      Retrieves the email address of the user.
      Returns:
      The email address of the user.

    • getFaculty

      public CAMs.Schools getFaculty()
      Retrieves the school faculty associated with this user.
      Returns:
      The school faculty of the user.

    • getUserID

      public String getUserID()
      Retrieves the user ID based on the email address.
      Returns:
      The user ID.

    • getFirstTimeLogin

      public boolean getFirstTimeLogin()
      Gets first-time login status of the user.
      Returns:
      true if the user is logging in for the first time, false otherwise.

    • setFirstTimeLogin

      public void setFirstTimeLogin()
      Sets first-time login status to false, indicating that user has completed the initial login.

    • printAvailableCamps

      public void printAvailableCamps(List<CAMs.Camp> storedCamps)
      Prints information about available camps to the console.
      Parameters:
      storedCamps - The List of Camp objects to display.

    • getPassword

      public String getPassword()
      Retrieves password associated with the user.
      Returns:
      The password of the user.

    • getUsernamePassword

      public static User getUsernamePassword(CAMs.UserDataManager userDataManager)
      Retrieves user credentials (username and password) and validates the login.
      Parameters:
      userDataManager - The UserDataManager object to fetch user data from.
      Returns:
      The User object representing the logged-in user, or null if the login is unsuccessful.

    • setPassword

      public void setPassword(String newPassword)
      Sets a new password for the user.
      Parameters:
      newPassword - The new password to be set.

    • changePassword

      public void changePassword()
      Changes the password for user. The user is prompted to enter the current password and a new password. Password change is successful only if the current password is entered correctly.
